transcript:
Hello.
Executive: Haan, bolti.
Customer: Haan, sir, ye keh rahi hu ki aapne jis haan, aapne other mail id se join kiya tha na, ab aapne phone se join kiya to aapke phone me jo mail id ho, wo aap mujhe de dijiye, mujhe update karna rahega. 
Customer: Thik hai, aur second me ye keh rahi hu, ye jo concern aapne customer care ko call kiya tha na, wo concern raise ho gaya tha hamari taraf se, to mere mere personal feedback ke liye aapke paas jayega, to aap usko mark kar dijiyega jo bhi aap karna chahte ho. 
Customer: Thik hai.
Customer: Wo India mart ke liye nahi hoga feedback, wo mere liye hoga keval.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Ji ji, apna mail id aap mujhe ek baar whatsapp kar dijiye, mujhe call update karni hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Requesting the mail ID used on the phone to update records.

- Mentioning a concern was raised with customer care and feedback will be sent for personal review.

- Clarifying the feedback is not for IndiaMART but for personal use.

- Requesting the mail ID to be sent via WhatsApp for call update.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to provide the email ID.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Executive to share email ID via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

email id, update, feedback, concern, whatsapp
